title: Violet Dawn
description: Violet Dawn is out of print as of 3/31/15 due to publisher closing its doors.Here is where the reprint is: https://www.goodreads.com/book/show/2...In the darkest place, the Light shines brightest. Emma’s love saved Jake from life as a vampire. But their happily ever after is threatened by a savage Vamp seeking retribution for destroying the Avenos Trinity of Evil.A mysterious stranger enters the mix, coinciding with the first Vamp attack in months. Emma’s new friendship, and the suspicion and deceit surrounding it, further drives a wedge between her and Jake.To complicate things, Emma is bitten by a Vamp with abilities no one has ever seen before, and that bite has left its mark.A mark that might tear Jake and Emma apart forever…
author: Lynn Rush
